title: Language Proficiency Enhancement Process Through Self-Regulated Learning and Corrective Interaction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and professional work experience
context.additional_context: Advanced language proficiency course for professionals: Focuses on enhancing learning efficiency through self-regulated learning strategies and cognitive calibration in limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners can perform language tasks with over 80% accuracy by utilizing self-regulated learning strategies (self-assessment, goal setting, strategy modification)
Learners can improve the accuracy of cognitive calibration regarding their language proficiency by over 70% through self-monitoring
Learners can reduce errors occurring in the learning process by over 50% through feedback incorporation and strategy adjustments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
